title: Cambridge Centre for Nutritional Epidemiology in Cancer Prevention and Survival (CCNC)
abstractText: The mission of CNC is to provide a more specific basis for intervention studies, public health advice and clinical guidance on treatment concerning diet and cancer. CNC will aim to interest and inform the general public of developments and ensure that its findings are incorporated into advice available to doctors, government agencies and charities. Consistent advice will enable the consumer to change dietary habits in order to avoid the risk of cancer.
